attributes.description: If you looking for quality Pre-Owned Vehicles no further.Our vehicles go through a i60-pont check quality check to ensure you are getting value for your money.Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.Delivery can be arranged nationwide.Price excludes admin and delivery fee.Finance can be arranged on premises and trade ins welcome.We at Motus ford Germiston strive for perfection,so every customer makes the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect on our showroom floor.We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives,to help with all your vehicle requirements.

2022 FORD ECOSPORT 1.0 ECOBOOST TREND
This quality used vehicle is at Motus Ford Paarden Eiland, just next to the N1 in Cape Town. We deliver nationwide and will arrange your finance and insurance with ease. We have a full range pre-owned Ford and other popular brands of used vehicles. We would like to give you the best deal on a used car or low mileage demo vehicle.
We also offer value added products such as:
Mechanical Breakdown Warranty
Maintenance and Service Plans
Crystal Fusion Windshield Protection / Reduces Night Glare
Restore it Care – Bodyline and Interior Maintenance
Matrix – Beame Recovery

attributes.description:
1st installment December 2022
Here are some of what the team at Motus Select Kia Durban offers you in making the purchase of your new preowned car a positive and stress free one.
1)	We can tailor make a deal to suit you.
2)	101-point check and road worthy done on all our cars (AA Dekra).
3)	Finance department offering you the best deal from all the major banks.
4)	We also have loads of products to assist you while owning your car. Here are a few:
Service plans, maintenance plans, extended warranty, warranty booster, renew tech, tracking system, crystal fusion and safety film.
Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
The Mighty EX8 epitomises innovation, strength and quality – bringing you a great partner for business. Manufactured with proprietary Hyundai steel and holding an impressive 4-year unlimited-mileage warranty, the EX8 has the strength and assurance to transport maximum cargo with sheer confidence and safety.
The advanced, practical design of the EX8, gives your business a competitive edge. An improved step design, secure-grip door handles and a much wider field of view form part of the great standout features that promote safer, easier and more controlled driving.
Enjoy an enhanced lower-back supportive seat, an easily accessible instrument panel and more headroom and legroom than ever before in the Mighty EX8. The taller and wider windows, redesigned side mirrors and night-optimised headlights offer superior safety and peace of mind.
Get the job done right every time. Experience strength and reliability with Mighty EX8.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.

attributes.description:
PICANTO 1.0 AT STREET
All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXSTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Brackenfell Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit you needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Kia Konfidence Brackenfell TEAM NOW!
